page.title: 05FARMING(cont)
page.content: farmers crops.There were other types of fencing other than hawthorn bushes. These were electric fencing and wooden fencing.Coniferous trees and deciduous trees were growing in and around the fields.There are not many gates leading into the fields. Farmers appear to live prospersous ,fulfilled lives.They have a settled lifestyle & whilst the advent of mechanisation on the farmhas had a big impact on the numbers of farm labourers,the owners seem to be affected only by the changing subsidies coming from the EEC.Thus {oil-seed rape},unheard of in these parts ten years ago,now dominates the summer landscape with its urgent,unrestful canary -yellow hue.
